archimate:Requirement.name: PM.1.4.4b: b) prohibit sharing of devices and passwords/passphrases with other individuals (including family members and friends) and surrendering the device to unauthorised organisations (e.g. those that supplied the device, such as device manufacturers and retail organisations, and maintenance organisations)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
